DVL 40 NW JMS 40 NW MBG 30 W Y22 25 WSW DIK 40 N ISN 110 N ISN.

RRT 35 E TVF 10 E AXN 15 SE FRM 35 SSE OTM 20 SSW UIN 40 ENE VIH 15
SSW POF 40 WSW UOX 15 SE GLH ELD 30 SSW DEQ 20 SW EMP 50 SSW EAR 10
SSW IML 25 WNW SNY 45 WNW CDR 45 ESE 4BQ 35 WNW SDY 100 N OLF.
